title: Rebel Angels
description: Serafina and Peter are exact opposites--she's a daredevil and he's very cautious. When Serafina's sports car fatally crashes into Peter's, the two meet face-to-face with one thing in common, they're in heaven, where they learn that the only way to become full-fledged angels is to prove that they can work together.
author: Jahnna N. Malcolm
